mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_resource t1 INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT resource_id FROM sys_role_resource_permission WHERE role_id IN ( SELECT role_id FROM sys_user_role WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 1 ) AND status = 1 AND permission_id=#{permissionId} ) t2 ON t1.id = t2.resource_id AND t1.parent_id = #{parentId} AND t1.status = 1 ORDER BY t1.sort ASC ,t1.create_time DESC
